parties.title: WWDC Run
parties.details: Kick off your mornings right with an easy 5k jog along the Guadalupe River while chattting about all the fun stuff announced at WWDC. Anyone who owns a pair of running shoes is encouraged to join us. Last year the runs lasted ~32 minutes, so it was a pretty easy 9:30/min pace.

parties.title: Night of Dim Sum 2018
parties.details: Night of Dim Sum is a night of all-you-can-eat food at Din Tai Fung! Located just a couple of miles from downtown San Jose in the Westfield Valley Fair Mall (colocated with an Apple Store and a LEGO store), Din Tai Fung is internationally known as one of the world's best Shanghai dumpling restaurants.

parties.title: Relay FM Live
parties.details: Watch Relay FM record a live podcast.

parties.title: The Talk Show with John Gruber Live
parties.details: Tickets are not yet available, but will be soon.

parties.title: James Dempsey and the Breakpoints
parties.details:
Join James Dempsey and the Breakpoints for an evening of mingling and music to benefit App Camp For Girls!

Doors open at 7:00 PM for the cocktail hour with plenty of time to meet and mingle.

The music starts about 8:30 PM when James Dempsey and the Breakpoints take the stage to perform a full concert of humorous nerdy songs including favorites from their #5 Billboard-charting comedy album, Backtrace.

No WWDC ticket is required to attend, but attendees must be 21 years of age or older.

There will be an open bar, with top-shelf liquors, beer and wine flowing from 7:00 - 11:00 pm.

parties.title: Firebase party at WWDC18
parties.details:
Heading to WWDC this year? Join us at the Firebase party on June 4th as we celebrate with the top iOS developers from around the world.

We’re excited to once again throw a party for our community at this year’s conference. If you’re going to be in town, join us for a night to mingle with other developers, meet engineers and product leads from the Fabric+Firebase team, and relax after the first day of WWDC.

We can’t wait to see you and toast to another exciting summer of mobile development.

When: Monday, June 4th, 2018
Time: 8:00pm - 12:00am
Where: The GlassHouse
Price: Free (!)
Tickets are limited so request your invite today! (Note: a confirmed ticket is required for entry)

parties.title: sjMacIndie
parties.details: sjMacIndie is the premier networking event that kicks off WWDC. It is for independent iOS and Mac developers, designers, WWDC and AltConf attendees and anyone else who's interested. It will be a great opportunity to connect and network!

parties.title: The Loop Bash
parties.details:
Join Jim Dalrymple, MacStadium, Pixelmator, and MacPaw for an incredible night of music from The Houserockers on the first night of WWDC.

The party is being held at The Ritz, San Jose's top nightclub, which is just one block from WWDC, on Monday, June 4, 2018, from 8:00 pm to 12:00 am.

You must bring your RSVP to the venue in order to get entry into the party. You also must be 21 because we will be serving free beer and wine throughout the night. Other alcoholic beverages will be available to purchase at the venue.

Please arrive early. Having an RSVP does not guarantee entry into the event.

Many thanks to our sponsors, MacStadium, Pixelmator, and MacPaw for making this party a reality!

parties.title: SwiftConf.com Drink Up
parties.details:
Friday @ WWDC is often sad. Sure, some people left already, but hey, isn't there a saying that says that those who stays are the best. So like last year, SEVEN PRINCIPLES has decided to offer a drink to a the first 50 that show up with a registered (here) free (digital) ticket. Last year we almost reached our budget, so come over — please get a ticket though, and show it on your phone when you arrive. Stuff, the original creator of the conference, as well as Christian, from 7P, who'll pay the bill :) will be there.

IMPORTANT: You need to have *something* to do with WWDC/Apple/iOS/YouKnow.. You don't need a WWDC Ticket/Badge, obviously, but if you're (e.g.) a carpenter and happen to find this on EventBrite, hum, no. No offense intended, but this is a Drinkup for people gathering for the week in San Jose for being at any of the "Apple Related" Conference. Hope it's okay and you'll understand why we do this Drink Up.

We'll very soon announce where it will be, but it'll be in a Beer Pub in San Jose, definetly.

parties.title: Vapor @ WWDC18
parties.details:
Come meet fellow Vapor developers at WWDC and the surrounding conferences! Chat about all things Vapor and Server-Side Swift.

There will be food and drink provided by Broken Hands. The location is TBC and will be announced once finalised.
